sentences.sCn: 一个捉摸不透、三心二意的情人

synos.tran: 浮躁的；易变的；变幻无常的

remMethod.val: 他和她之间的友谊只值五分钱 (nickle)， 靠不住 → 变化无常的

trans.tranCn: 变化无常的， 浮躁的
trans.tranOther: someone who is fickle is always changing their mind about people or things that they like, so that you cannot depend on them – used to show disapproval
